page.title: 12 contributors
page.content:
This block has been compiled by the staff and pupils at Mayfield School - a Secondary school for girls, Henry Compton School - a Secondary school for boys, Lady Margarets School - a primary school, and Sir Walter St. John's School - a Secondary School for boys. The effort was coordinated by Sir Walter St. John's School.
Pupils who contributed include Jimmy Brinkley, Robert Halm-Owoo, Mehmet Etem, Ricky Rodgers, and Wi Po Ho. These names reflect the diversity of the cultural backgrounds of the pupils attending schools in this area of London. This group are of English, Nigerian, Turkish, West Indian and Chinese origin (though mostly born in England.
